Identification_Area.title: The New Exploration of Tempel 1 (NExT) Mission

Modification_Detail.description: Per "Guide toPDS4 Context Products" v1.3, - changed all lidvid_reference to lid_reference - changed target LIDs to new formation rule
extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model
Updated schema version. Adding missing "instrument" references. Adding missing "agency" references.

Investigation.name: New Exploration of Tempel 1 Mission
Investigation.description: The NExT mission was the extended mission, approved in 2007, for the Stardust spacecraft after it successfully returned samples of comet dust to Earth. The Stardust spacecraft was redirected to intercept Comet 9P/Tempel 1, target of the Deep Impact mission in in 2005, to image the impact area. Small changes were noted.
